name: Dinner with Andracula
description:
“My Dinner with Andracula” is a VR comedy dating simulator that focuses on the player going out on a date with Andracula. On the date with Andracula, the player is given a linear narrative and is able to pick the social lines that interact with Andracula. The narrative aspect of the game focuses on how Andraluca is poorly hiding his secret of being a vampire and progresses as the character calls him out for it.

“My Dinner with Andracula” was a 2-man(myself and SansTypic) project at SAE Institute that had a 3 week time frame to complete. It was intended to be in VR but due to limitations this is a simulation as to what a VR version would be like.
